official_title: A bill to prohibit the sale, alienation, or commitment of gold by the Secretary of the Treasury without prior approval by act of Congress.

summary.text: Disallows the Secretary of the Treasury from selling, alienating or committing gold without prior approval from Congress.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the sale, alienation, or commitment of gold by the Secretary of the Treasury without prior approval by act of Congress.
